step1.title: Set up your personal billing profile.
step1.description: Verify your personal information and provide your document ID.

step2.title: Update your description
step2.description: To help others find out who you really are.

step3.title: Update your contact methods.
step3.description: Make sure that you’re reachable through multiple accounts.

step4.title: Complete your first contribution.
step4.description: Even if it’s not rewarded, we value your work on your profile.

step5.title: Claim your first reward
step5.description: Go to your reward page and follow the 2 min process.

public.subtitle: Sign-up and create your account
public.description: Get access to more than 200 projects to contribute to.

learnMore.title: Learn more about Onlydust
learnMore.subtitle: “I don’t know where to start.” Sound familiar? Read on.
learnMore.description: When asking contributors what the most challenging thing for them was when starting out on their open source journey, we started to notice some common frustrations that many have faced at some point or another.
